text: I have some ramdisks and kernels for some in house operating systems that I need to create bootenvs for - I'm guessing I just need to tar them up and define Initrd and Kernel correctly
Yes - it explodes it in the tftpboot directory so it can be served.
Yes.  tars are valid “isos”  - look at the sledgehammer tarball
yeah, that's where I got my assumption from. thanks
